text: I’m trying to create a meeting link for new users to sign up for a meeting with their assigned contact owner.  It seems to me that the best way to do this is to have a round-robin meeting link where we pass the user’s email as a query parameter. I am attempting this link but it doesn’t seem to pass the email. Anything obvious I’m doing wrong? <https://meetings.HubSpot.com/amywalters/new-subscription-onboarding?email=amy.walters@wisepelican.com>
